# attributedLabel

**Instance Property**

An attributed version of the label for the data point.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var attributedLabel: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Specifying the label

- **label**: The label for the data point.

items.description: The label for the data point.
items.name: label
